events.name: Bitfinex Hack-Using Alt Finance for the Recovery wth Simon Dixon:BnkToTheFuture
events.description:
In August of this year, the bitcoin exchange Bitfinex reported a hack to its wallet. 119k btc $60m was reportedly stolen. Bitfinex socialized the loss with a 36% haircut to users accounts and an issuance of a new token.  BnkToTheFuture's online investment platform is currently hosting the funding round allowing BFX token holders to convert into Bitfinex equity. Simon Dixon the CEO & co-founder of BnkToTheFuture.com will be presenting. Please RSVP! We need to know numbers for the space. 


Pizza and Beer sponsored by CoinHako bitcoin wallet and brokerage.
events.location: Paypal at Suntec , 5 Temasek Blvd, #07-01 Suntec Tower Five, Nearest Mrt:Promenade(Yellow Line), Singapore
